name: Wood Elf Freedom Fighter
description:
A hack and slash action game about a wood elf on a quest to regain freedom for herself and her people. Fight your way through the knights of the Order of Progress and defeat their leaders. Steal their pants and wear them yourself to become more powerful.

Instructions

  • Click  ground to move, objects to interact.
  • Press numbers 1-5 to use your skills (only skill 1 is available in the demo version).
  • Press Q to drink a health potion.

Credits

  • @kahvikatti programming, UI
  • @veetee 3D modeling, textures, level design

This prototype was made in 30 days as a school assignment.
